column5: Will be going to Reindeer Lake the 23rd thru the 30th and am wondering if anyone has any reports yet on how the weather is, how the fish are biting and if the bugs are biting. We are fishing the southern part of the lake and any info would be great. TIA.

Was talking to my neighbour who fishes Reindeer he caught a 45 pounder Lake trout last year north end,thats where he said the bigones are.We live about 6 hours south of Reindeer the weather has been nice in the north and yes the bugs are biting they always are.He's heading there in a couple weeks,he used to live there.
Thanks for the update, are there anymore people out there that have heard or been too this lake this year? 2 weeks to go :-)
